about_the_game:
MUTATE AND EVOLVE

Play as a virus in Winnie's body.

Capture cells to grow mutations and build a deck of actions.

Refine his primitive form, adapt for survival, and do not let his friends contain you. They do not understand our gift... We must share it with them.

EXPLORE AND DISCOVER

Explore randomly generated worlds by placing Virus blocks to spread through the body of your host.

Discover new cells and make gut decisions to direct the adventure.

Collect resources and unlock new abilities.

Evolve and modify your virus blocks to accelerate your growth and create more powerful combinations in battle.

COMBO-DRIVEN DECKBUILDING

Enter the brain in turn-based battles, where your actions are dealt to the board.

Strategise with your block shapes to create powerful combinations.

Survive and adapt as you discover the limitations of the host... and how to overcome them.

Evolve with each run as you unlock ways to customise and upgrade your virus.

Push the bounds of what our host can be. Together we survive.

FEATURES

  • Mutate, spread and evolve as a symbiotic virus.

  • 'Bodybuilding' turn-based roguelite in the body and mind of your host.

  • Deckbuilder combat which connects seemlessly with exploration, using your virus bocks to activate Action combos in a fresh and dynamic battle system.

  • A Holesome horror comedy story which reimagines the universe of Winnie in a world of dark science and medical malpractise.

  • Define your run through an exploration system that departs from the typical roguelite node map and replaces it with strategic, turn-based building using a set of tetromino-like virus blocks which you can evolve and reshape.

MUTATE AND EVOLVE

Play as a virus in Winnie's body.

Capture cells to grow mutations and build a deck of actions.

Refine his primitive form, adapt for survival, and do not let his friends contain you. They do not understand our gift... We must share it with them.

EXPLORE AND DISCOVER

Explore randomly generated worlds by placing Virus blocks to spread through the body of your host.

Discover new cells and make gut decisions to direct the adventure.

Collect resources and unlock new abilities.

Evolve and modify your virus blocks to accelerate your growth and create more powerful combinations in battle.

COMBO-DRIVEN DECKBUILDING

Enter the brain in turn-based battles, where your actions are dealt to the board.

Strategise with your block shapes to create powerful combinations.

Survive and adapt as you discover the limitations of the host... and how to overcome them.

Evolve with each run as you unlock ways to customise and upgrade your virus.

Push the bounds of what our host can be. Together we survive.

name: Winnie's Hole

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8
  • Processor: 2Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible with 512 MB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Join Winnie on a new adventure, from within! Play as a virus in his body and mind. Capture cells to mutate and build a deck of actions to unleash in combo-driven combat. A genre-blending roguelite with a dark yet charming story. Embrace discomfort - Sometimes we can't help being seen as a monster...
